com.coffee.modelParsers.basicHLVLPackage

Class HlvlBasicFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coffee.modelParsers.basicHLVLPackage.HlvlBasicFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HlvlBasicKeys, IhlvlBasicFactory

    public class HlvlBasicFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IhlvlBasicFactory, HlvlBasicKeys
    Class in xtend implementing the IhlvlFactory this class implements the transformation rules from basic variability models in the basic dialect of HLVL (Hlvl(basic))
    Author:
    Angela Villota Coffee V1 January 2019

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.coffee.modelParsers.basicHLVLPackage.HlvlBasicKeys

        public java.lang.String getDecomposition(java.lang.String parent,

        Specified by:
        getDecomposition in interface IhlvlBasicFactory
        Parameters:
